column1: Kata Robata////When Hubbs ordered the scallops with goat cheese
column2: I gave him one of my skeptical faces with one brow higher than the other. Goat cheese and raw scallops? Seriously
column3: I would never have ordered this based on the description alone. Mr. Sushi Chef
column4: you are seriously brilliant. My toes curled in sheer foodgasmic joy. This combination
column6: seriously works and is utterly mouthwatering and luscious. Bravo ... you have won my heart AND my soul.
